item.title: Picking a mobile phone plan: AT&T
item.description: I am currently a Sprint customer, and I am in the process of considering a replacement. So I analyzed AT&T’s plans. I found some interesting things: They have three individual plans that don’t include long distance to Canada but do include US long distance. min cost $/min Over $/min Min over to break even with next plan Rollover Weekend min 450 $ 39.99 $ 0.089 0.45 44 yes 5000 900
